alert.note: Alert for Milam (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 02 at 9:10PM CDT until April 02 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Milam County in central Texas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 909 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northeast of Rockdale, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rockdale, Milano, Hoyte, Elevation, Hanover, Minerva and Gause. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
